attributes.action: Leave our Lady Britannia alone, not to remove her from the 50 pence coin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The patriotic symbol - based on a Roman goddess - will no longer be on any British coin for the first time in more than 300 years.
Gordon Brown as Chancellor, sanctioned this shortly before he entered Downing Street last June. 

Come on UK let's keep our "Britishness" and be proud of our symbols.
What's next, the union flag!

Leave our Lady Britannia alone!

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/50pence/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
